casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrell Lee MELTON 253PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2017 Matthew Thomas Tulchin, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Melton, Darrell Lee.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of December 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 5th day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
